ComicInfo.Summary: Signs and Portents Part 2: With people all over the city killing themselves and each other, Sara and Tilly try to track down Lachryma before all of New York succumbs to her power of despair. Sara is too late, however, to prevent her partner Jake from trying to kill her sister.
